description.description: an exhaustive description of the dataset including methods of collection, extraction or analysis

frequency.description: frequency of the dataset generation which MUST be expressed in yearly, monthly, daily, hourly

human-validated.description: human-validated describes if the dataset has been manually validated

license.description: license MUST be expressed in SPDX format to describe under which license the dataset is distributed

machine-validated.description: machine-validated describes if the dataset has been automatically validated

producer.description: producer MUST be expressed as an URI to reference the original producer of the dataset

subtitle.description: an extended title of the dataset

time-precision.description: time-precision MUST be expressed in years, months, days, hours, minutes or seconds to describe the precision of the time expressed

title.description: a comprehensive and concise title of the dataset

description: An object describing an open dataset available and described under the open data security model. ref. https://github.com/CIRCL/open-data-security
name: open-data-security
